about_the_game:
Noir Light is an atmospheric adventure game where you become Detective Jacob, tasked with solving a series of mysterious and interconnected crimes. Explore the dark and dangerous corners of a city in turmoil, where every decision you make brings you closer to uncovering the truth—or losing yourself to the shadows.

Step by step, you'll piece together the larger puzzle as you navigate a world full of secrets, dangers, and moral dilemmas. Noir Light blends gripping narrative, top-down action, and optional stealth mechanics to immerse you in a neo-noir detective experience.

Will you uncover the truth, or will the city consume you?

Dialogue System

  • Branching Choices: Shape the story through meaningful dialogue options that open new paths or create unexpected consequences.

  • Immersive Interactions: Converse with deep, multi-dimensional characters, uncovering secrets and building alliances.

  • Detective's Edge: Use Jacob's intuition to detect hidden motives and extract critical clues during conversations.

Detective Instinct

  • Clue Detection: Activate Jacob's heightened senses to reveal hidden evidence and subtle details in the environment.

  • Interactive Investigations: Piece together discovered clues to reconstruct crime scenes and uncover critical leads.

  • Strategic Use: Manage your instincts wisely, as they recharge over time, adding a layer of tactical depth to investigations.

Puzzle-Solving

  • Challenging Riddles: Tackle a variety of puzzles that test your logic, observation, and problem-solving skills.

  • Story Integration: Each puzzle ties into the narrative, revealing key details and advancing the investigation.

Multi-Path Gameplay

  • Stealth Approach: Sneak past enemies undetected or eliminate them silently, using shadows and distractions to your advantage.

  • Action-Packed Combat: Choose to confront foes head-on with intense, dynamic battles that test your reflexes and strategy.

  • Player Agency: Adapt your playstyle and make choices that influence the story, offering unique experiences with every run.

content_descriptors.notes:
Players use a variety of weapons, including pistols, rifles, and improvised explosive devices. They also rely on chokeholds, strikes with metal pipes, and other hand-to-hand combat techniques to defend themselves against human characters. 

All actions resembling violent scenes take place during black screens and are not shown directly.
